sentences.en: A shaggy style that has lots of chunky layers all over.
sentences.cn: 打了很多厚层次的蓬松发型.

sentences.en: Chunky knits, embroidery and crochet are key features are proving popular with the high street.
sentences.cn: 密密的针脚, 刺绣和钩织的制品成为大街上推动潮流的主要特征.

sentences.en: General Dreedle, the wing commander, was a blunt, chunky, barrel - chested man in his early fifties.
sentences.cn: 联队司令德里德尔将军已经五十多岁, 是个态度生硬, 身材矮胖, 胸部宽得象只琵琶桶那样的人.

sentences.en: Her taste in fiction was for chunky historical romances.
sentences.cn: 她喜欢的小说是大部头的历史言情故事。

sentences.en: Julie: Thick and chunky, please. And leave the skin on too.
sentences.cn: 朱莉: 切成厚块. 另外也不要削皮.

sentences.en: One of my favorite foods is chunky peanut butter and strawberry jam between toasted Eggo waffles.
sentences.cn: 我最喜欢的一种食物是在烤好的茄子waffles上抹上花生黄油和草莓酱.

sentences.en: Some have chunky heels and laces, while others are flat - heeled slip - ons.
sentences.cn: 有些笨重的高跟鞋,鞋带, 而其他平跟鞋滑组件.

sentences.en: Some people seem born to be square and chunky.
sentences.cn: 有些人似乎生来就又矮又胖.

sentences.en: Term for reds meaning solid or chunky.
sentences.cn: 任期难逃含义固体或块状.

sentences.en: That's for bears and sharks, Chunky Chew.
sentences.cn: 像是黑熊与鲨鱼一样, 用力的咀嚼.

sentences.en: The amount of thrust needed to move its chunky frame stirred up a thick cloud.
sentences.cn: 为了移动它矮胖的身躯,需要用到大量的推进力,但是却因此扬起厚重的尘云.

sentences.en: The dumplings were chunky pieces of uncooked dough.
sentences.cn: 这些饺子是一些黏糊糊的生面团块.

sentences.en: The soprano was a chunky girl from California.
sentences.cn: 女高音歌手是个来自加利福尼亚的壮硕姑娘。

sentences.en: This animal is chunky and short - legged, with a body sometimes thirty inches long.
sentences.cn: 这种动物矮胖结实,足短, 身高有时达30英寸.
